main.name: Nordic-Giant Project
main.description: I am a web development engineer and I use react and vue.js to develop pages. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page
main.bio: I have just finished my degree in computer engineering and am currently in my master's degree in computer engineering. I am very interested in front-end web development. I had the opportunity to develop projects in React, however I am strongly interested and motivated to learn new technologies beyond this. I like to work in a team, I am communicative, I learn fast and I am very interested in broadening my knowledge in the area.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.
